name: HONK III
description:
HONK HONK, MOTHERDUCKERS!

Dreadful Doombell has summoned dozens of uncanny beasts. Only the Gooseguy can fight them. In the final combat with the hordes of Honkhell spawns he will break through the mazes and destroy Doombell!

QUACK AND HONK UNTIL IT'S DONE!

CONTROLS CONTROLACTIONWSADMovementMouseAimLMBShootSpaceJumpMouse WheelChange weaponEInteract (INCLUDING SECRET WALLS)QHONK OST

You can listen to the game music on SoundCloud

TEAM
  • Artyom "Tricky Fat Cat" Volkov  — programming, game design;
  • Sava T — music and sounds;
  • Ruslan Seferbekov — level design, game design;
  • Daniil Morozov — 3D artist, material artist, animator;
  • Grigorij "Syntheslav" Markov — music and sounds;
  • Vitalii Kuznetsov — level design, game design; (FIRST GAME JAM EVER!)
